topic.title: Stats on my Zeroblog?
topic.body: I had a spike of users sharing my blog. I whish there was a stat tool to measure my audience. Is there one?

1543560618_1GtwWtJ66M2wm3raW2ZvUByneLefc.body: are you on any darknet market? (looking for feedbacks)

1544189569_13pMUCyHCSA16YYxki54Zh8FCv6qL.body:
> [blurhy](#comment_188_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): There is no way to count all users,but you can force every user post a comment when visit



I see, something like... "I ask a little favor to every reader who goes all the way to my posts. Would you leave a comment just to tell me how you got here?"
